{"step_by_step_thinking": "Food poisoning is caused by the enterotoxins produced by Staphylococcus aureus, as mentioned in Document 10 and Document 26. Toxic shock syndrome is caused by the toxins produced by Staphylococcus aureus, as mentioned in Document 0, Document 1, Document 9, Document 11, Document 12, Document 14, Document 17, Document 26, and Document 30. Staphylococcal scalded skin syndrome is caused by the exotoxins produced by Staphylococcus aureus, as mentioned in Document 0, Document 3, Document 5, Document 9, Document 11, Document 14, Document 17, and Document 26. Septicemic shock is not mentioned in the documents as being caused by a toxin produced by Staphylococcus aureus.", "answer_choice": "B. Septicemic shock"}
